fields.name: fields
fields.help_text: Response field. The fields are separated with commas. Embedded fields are separated with dots. To exclude a field, use “-” in front of its name. In case the parameter is not defined, the method returns all fields. Maximum limit: 100.

fields.name: type
fields.help_text:
Search type. Default is "startswith". Valid values:

* "startswith" — Search by initial characters of player name. Minimum length: 3 characters. Maximum length: 24 characters. (by default)
* "exact" — Search by exact match of player name. Case insensitive. You can enter several names, separated with commas (up to 100).

fields.name: search
fields.help_text: Player name search string. Parameter "type" defines minimum length and type of search. Using the exact search type, you can enter several names, separated with commas. Maximum length: 24.

fields.name: limit
fields.help_text: Number of returned entries (fewer can be returned, but not more than 100). If the limit sent exceeds 100, a limit of None is applied (by default).

methods.description: Method returns partial list of players. The list is filtered by initial characters of user name and sorted alphabetically.

errors: Limit of passed-in **account_id** IDs exceeded. Maximum: 100.

methods.name: Sign in with Console service

fields.name: location
fields.help_text:
URL where user is redirected for authentication.
This URL is returned only if parameter **nofollow=1** is passed in.

fields.name: expires_at
fields.help_text:
**Access_token** expiration time in UNIX. Delta can also be specified in seconds.

Expiration time and delta must not exceed two weeks from the current time.

fields.name: redirect_uri
fields.help_text:
URL where user is redirected after authentication.

By default: [{API_HOST}/blank/](https://{API_HOST}/blank/)

fields.name: display
fields.help_text:
Layout for mobile applications. Valid values:

* "page" — Page 
* "popup" — Popup window 
* "touch" — Mobile view

fields.name: nofollow
fields.help_text: If parameter **nofollow=1** is passed in, the user is not redirected. URL is returned in response. Default is 0. Min value is 0. Maximum value: 1.

fields.name: language
fields.help_text:
Authentication form localization language. Default is "en". Valid values:

* "cs" — Czech 
* "de" — German 
* "en" — English (by default)
* "es" — Spanish 
* "es-ar" — Argentinian Spanish 
* "fr" — French 
* "ja" — Japanese 
* "pl" — Polish 
* "pt-br" — Brazilian Portuguese 
* "ru" — Russian 
* "th" — Thai 
* "tr" — Turkish 
* "vi" — Vietnamese 
* "zh-tw" — Traditional Chinese 
* "zh-cn" — Simplified Chinese

methods.description:
Method authenticates user based on PlayStation Network ID which is used in World of Tanks PlayStation 4. To log in, player must enter PlayStation Network ID and password.

Information on authorization status is sent to URL specified in **redirect_uri** parameter.

If authentication is successful, the following parameters are sent to **redirect_uri**:

*  **status: ok** — successful authentication
*  **access_token** — access token is passed in to all methods that require authentication
*  **expires_at** — expiration date of **access_token**
*  **account_id** — user ID
*  **nickname** — user name
*  **psn_access_token** — PlayStation Network access token
*  **psn_access_token_expires_at** — expiration date of **psn_access_token**.

If authentication fails, the following parameters are sent to **redirect_uri**:

*  **status: error** — authentication error
*  **code** — error code
*  **message** — error message.

methods.name: Access Token extension

fields.name: access_token
fields.help_text: Access token is passed to all methods requiring authorization.

fields.name: access_token
fields.help_text: [Access token](/documentation/guide/principles/#access_token) for the private data of a user's account; can be received via the authorization method; valid within a stated time period

fields.name: expires_at
fields.help_text:
**Access_token** expiration time in UNIX. Delta can also be specified in seconds.

Expiration time and delta must not exceed two weeks from the current time.

methods.description:
Method generates new **access_token** based on the current token.

This method is used when the player is still using the application but the current **access_token** is about to expire.

fields.help_text: [Access token](/documentation/guide/principles/#access_token) for the private data of a user's account; can be received via the authorization method; valid within a stated time period

methods.description:
Method deletes user's **access_token**.

After this method is called, **access_token** becomes invalid.

methods.name: Vehicle achievements

fields.name: language
fields.help_text:
Localization language. Default is "en". Valid values:

* "en" — English (by default)
* "ru" — Русский 
* "pl" — Polski 
* "de" — Deutsch 
* "fr" — Français 
* "es" — Español 
* "tr" — Türkçe

fields.name: fields
fields.help_text: Response field. The fields are separated with commas. Embedded fields are separated with dots. To exclude a field, use “-” in front of its name. In case the parameter is not defined, the method returns all fields. Maximum limit: 100.

fields.name: access_token
fields.help_text: [Access token](/documentation/guide/principles/#access_token) for the private data of a user's account; can be received via the authorization method; valid within a stated time period

fields.name: account_id
fields.help_text: Player account ID. Min value is 0.

fields.name: in_garage
fields.help_text:
Filter by vehicle availability in the Garage. If the parameter is not specified, all vehicles are returned. Parameter processing requires a valid access_token for the specified account_id. Valid values:

* "1" — Return vehicles available in the Garage. 
* "0" — Return vehicles that are no longer in the Garage.
